assignments.name: Construct_list_of_all_account_IDs

formulas.description: Sets the birthdate of the person to be the 1 of Jan of the year in which the person is born. This ensures we do not know the actual birthdate of the person (it might be 1 of Jan but we are unable to know that for sure once this process is complete), allowing us to develop some age related understanding.
formulas.name: randomBirthDate

formulas.description: Takes the first 3 characters of the person's post code only, so that we can't specifically identify them but can link them to an approximate region.
formulas.name: reducedPostCode

loops.name: Loop_opportunities_to_build_list_of_IDs
loops.label: Loop opportunities to build list of IDs

fields.name: HouseholdMessage
fields.fieldText:
You are going to forget the {!Get_household.Name} household with the following associated information.


Please review this information in detail to be sure that you want this to occur. This process is irreversible.

fields.name: ffFinancialProducts
fields.fieldText: FF financial products:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_HouseholdMessage
fields.fieldText: Forgotten process has run - please check the results and confirm they are as expected.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ffFinancialProducts
fields.fieldText: FF financial products:

screens.description: Present the lost notes to the user to ensure they are useful but anonymous .
screens.name: LostNotesCheck
screens.label: LostNotesCheck

fields.name: LostNotesMessage
fields.fieldText: Please check the lost notes do not identify the customer. If they do, make any updates necessary then click next.

variables.description: Collection variable storing the people and household.

variables.description: Stores the IDs of the people accounts in this flow.
variables.name: peopleAccountIds
